item.title: October 29, 2018 Joint Governing/Advisory Board Meeting
item.description: Minutes: Attending: All PIs, both governing board members, and most advisory board members, via Zoom. Short-term roadmap/minimum viable product: In general folks are supportive of current effort plans. However, there was consensus we need a tool for bespoke parameterization of molecules, especially internal molecules which might not be able to be disclosed to the larger effort, as part of our minimum viable product. Funding/financials: Currently we have eight partners on board (with openforcefield.
